name: mern-testing
description: MERN stack application with comprehensive testing

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:server && npm run test:unit:client
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:server && npm run test:integration:client
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:server && npm run coverage:client

author: Your Name
